name: Hello Doctor [LD48]
description:
Rules: Classic and wholesome therapy by minesweeper

- click cubes to see if they were bad memories or not
- if you click on bad memories there is a chance they will spread and take over the mind of your patient
- you got additional tools: every three turns you can reveal a cube with analyze
- every five turns you can discuss a problem to resolve all connected problems

The goal is to free your patient of all bad memories by discussing them.
